name: Artist: 八宝備仁 / 八宝备仁 | HAPPOBIJIN artist's painting style
description:
八宝備仁(HAPPOBIJIN) Style LoRA

中文 | English

仿八宝备仁的作画风格的LoRA模型。

好！提前解锁雪女篇！

权重建议值：1 (or 0.6~1.4)

基于模型：Anything-5RE

训练信息：筛选出共计732张原画（含CG图和裁剪图），迭代1464步，多分辨率迭代训练。

其他的一些建议：badhandv4, EasyNegative。万一缺胳膊少腿重画就行。

LoRA model with a painting style imitating HAPPOBIJIN.

Unlock the The snow girl arc in advance!

Recommended weight value: 1 (or ranging from 0.6 to 1.4).

Based on the model: Anything-5RE.

Training information: 732 original paintings (including CG images and cropped images) were selected for training, with 1,464 iterations using multi-resolution iteration training.

Other suggestions: Use badhandv4 and EasyNegative. In case there are missing arms and legs, redraw them.
